data.name: ACFUWSTC
data.value: Automatically check for updates when starting the converter

data.name: ASAR
data.value: Shut off the computer after rendering

data.name: CSFFS
data.value: Enable sound notifications for the conversion status

data.name: JKSUS
data.value: Join the Kep's Software Updates Server
data.comment: It lets you join KSUS on Discord.

data.name: KK99GP
data.comment: Shows the user my official GitHub page!

data.name: KK99YTC
data.comment: Shows the user my official YouTube page!

data.name: OpenSFVSTManager
data.comment: Open the SoundFonts and VST effects manager.

data.name: RenderTo
data.comment: Render to what? WAV? OGG? Your choice..

data.name: SCPIOTL
data.value: Show conversion position instead of time left

data.name: STDWD
data.value: Support the developer with a donation

data.name: Volume
data.comment: The volume label on the main window.

data.name: ActiveVoices
data.comment: The amount of voices that are current active in the stream.

data.name: AverageLevel
data.comment: The average level of the current stream.

data.name: ConnectionErrorDesc
data.value:
The converter can not connect to the GitHub servers.
Check your network connection, or contact your system administrator or network service provider.
Press OK to continue and open the converter's window.

data.name: DonateText
data.value:
This project can not maintain itself by downloads only.
I will not be able to keep this program updated forever, that's why a small donation from you could help me improve its features, and also help me improve the equipment that I work with.
Donations are optional, and if you don't want to see this dialog anymore, just click on "Do not show this ever again". You can still donate by navigating to "Help > Help the developer with a donation".
Thank you in advance.

data.name: DontShowAnymore
data.comment: You're not interested. You're a bad person.

data.name: FatalErrorHandler
data.value: Fatal error during the execution of Keppy's MIDI Converter! The application needs to be closed. Additional informations:
data.comment: The text of the error handler, after a fatal error.

data.name: IdleMessage
data.value: Waiting for user commands. Select a MIDI, load some soundfonts, and start the conversion/playback process!

data.name: KeepAliveProject
data.value: Donate to keep the project alive

data.name: MoveDown
data.comment: Move one item down at the time.

data.name: MoveUp
data.comment: Move one item up at the time.

data.name: NonFatalErrorHandler
data.value:
Something went wrong during the execution of the application.
Additional informations:
data.comment: The text of the error handler, after a non fatal error.

data.name: NoUpdatesFound
data.value:
{0} {1} is already up to date.
Click "OK" to close this dialog.

data.name: PeakLevel
data.comment: The peak level of the current stream.

data.name: RightClickCopyNotice
data.value: Right-click anywhere in the window to copy the message.

data.name: RMS
data.comment: The root mean square of the current stream.

data.name: SortName
data.comment: Sort all the MIDIs by name.

data.name: UpdateFound
RealTimeSim
data.comment: Simulates a real-time playback, when rendering.

data.name: CompilerDate
data.comment: It shows when this release got compiled.

data.name: HowManyTimesAdd
data.value:
How many times do you want to add this MIDI?
{0}
data.comment: How many times you want to add {0}, where {0} is the MIDI.

data.name: IgnoreSize
data.value: The converter will ignore the size of the MIDIs, and get their full info anyway.

data.name: InvalidMIDIFile
data.value:
{0} is not a valid MIDI file!
Please select a valid MIDI file, and retry.

data.name: MIDIFile
data.comment: The full path of the MIDI.

data.name: MIDINotes
data.comment: How many notes are present in the MIDI.

data.name: RevisionLabel
data.comment: {0} is the version of the library, {1} is the revision number.

data.name: SourceCodeText
data.value: Click here to open the official GitHub repository

data.name: TaCI
data.comment: Information text in the "Information about the converter" window.

data.name: Version
data.comment: Version number of {0}, where {0} stands for the item. (E.g. "BASSMIDI version")

data.name: WindowsBuild
data.comment: Shows the user the build number of his Windows installation.

data.name: WindowsName
data.comment: Shows the user the release name of his Windows installation.

data.name: NoEnoughMemoryMIDIInfo
data.value: There's no enough memory to get the info for this MIDI: {0}

data.name: AboutSFZFormatText
data.value:
This program is compliant to the "SFZ 1.0 format", and partially with the "SFZ 2.0 format".
Do you want to visit the "Unofficial SFZ format information" website?

data.name: AboutVSTSupportText
data.value:
This program supports VST DSPs.
Virtual Studio Technology (VST) is a software interface and technology by Steinberg Media Technologies. Copyright ©2006 Steinberg Media Technologies. All Rights Reserved.

data.name: AboutVSTSupportTitle
data.value: About the Virtual Studio Technology interface

data.name: ConverterIsBusyAlready
data.value: Wait for the previous conversion/preview to finish!
data.comment: The thread is already busy previewing/converting another MIDI.

ConvStatusFasterOld
ConvStatusNormalNew
ConvStatusNormalOld
ConvStatusSlowerNew
ConvStatusSlowerOld
ExportMIDIWindow
data.value: Select a folder for the conversion process
data.comment: Where do you want to export the files?

data.name: ImportMIDIWindow
data.comment: Which files do you want to import?

data.name: NoteOff1
data.value: Only release the oldest instance of a note upon note-off event.

data.name: PlaybackStatusNormal
SkipVSTSettings
data.value: The converter will not show you the VST settings.

data.name: SoundfontDialogMessage
data.value:
Use up to 1.000 soundfonts at once, to convert your MIDIs. The last SoundFont will override the ones above it, loading order is from top to bottom. Check if the SoundFonts are not corrupted, before adding them to the list, to avoid random crashes/glitches.
The following formats are supported: SF2, SF2PACK, SF3, SFZ
data.comment: The description in the SoundFont list editor.

data.name: SoundfontImportError
data.value:
This is not a valid soundfont!
Select a soundfont and try again.

data.name: SoundfontManagerTitle
data.comment: Title of the SoundFont list editor.

data.name: VSTHowDoTheyWork
data.value:
How do they work?
Effect 1 will apply its effect to the audio, then it'll pass the modified audio to Effect 2, that will then do the same with Effect 3 and so on.
It's a chain-like system.
data.comment: The description in the VST effects picker.

data.name: VSTInvalidCallError
VSTManager
data.comment: Title of the VST effects picker.

data.name: BNPSel
data.value: Selected a bank and a preset for the SoundFont

data.name: BNPSelDesc
data.value:
Please select a bank and a preset, from 0 to 127.
Use "Bank 0" and "Preset 0" for the standard "Acoustic Grand Piano", or if you don't know which one you should use.

data.name: BNPSelHelp
data.value:
Src.: Source of the bank/preset to import Des.: Bank/Preset to assign to the imported one.
Leave Src. Bank and Src. Preset to 0 for SFZ files.

data.name: BNPSelWiki
data.comment: List of banks and presets from text file.

data.name: DesBank
data.value: Destination ID of the imported bank:

data.name: DesPreset
data.value: Destination ID of the imported preset:

data.name: SrcBank
data.value: Source ID of the bank to import:

data.name: SrcPreset
data.value: Source ID of the preset to import:

data.name: 0Translators0
data.comment: You translated it! I think... If it says "KaleidonKep99", then you didn't.

data.name: AppBusy
data.value: The app is not done converting/playing MIDIs! Are you sure you want to exit?

data.name: AutoResizeColumns
data.comment: Let the converter automatically resize the columns.

data.name: BecomeAPatronTitle
data.value: Become a patron to keep the project alive

data.name: ChannelsSettingsAll
data.comment: The "All" name for the Channels Settings.

data.name: ChannelsSettingsChan
data.comment: The "Channel" name for the Channels Settings.

data.name: CopiedToClipboardNotice
data.value: The error has been copied to clipboard.

data.name: InvalidVSTLoaded
data.value:
{0} is not a valid VST effect! Be sure to load a VST effect and NOT a VST instrument.
If you're trying to use a {1} VST, you need to use a {1} version of Keppy's MIDI Converter too. The {2} version of Keppy's MIDI Converter does NOT support {1} VSTs and viceversa.

data.name: LegalWarningVSTi
data.value:
By clicking 'Yes', you agree not to abuse the 'VST instrument' feature to create, disseminate, or make accessible anything exploiting the copyrighted/protected samples or files included within a VST ("Visual Studio Technology" plugin).
Such resultant files could include (but are not limited to): SoundFonts, VSTs, or any other usable tool that commits copyright infringement.
Simply put it, you may not use this tool to commit piracy on a copyrighted/trademarked/protected VST, free or paid, unless you have permission from the developer. You may create audio at will from the VST, but DO NOT use this export feature to extract/"rip" samples from the VST.
The author assumes no legal responsibility from the use of this tool.
data.comment: This is to prevent people from blaming me for violating the copyright, by allowing people to sample VSTs. I'm not responsible of what people do with the converter.

data.name: MaxVoices
data.comment: The amount of voices allowed to be played at once.

data.name: MemoryAllocationConversion
data.value: The application is allocating memory for the conversion process. Please wait...

data.name: MemoryAllocationConversionVST
data.value: The application is allocating memory for the conversion process. Edit the VST DSPs settings when asked. Please wait...

data.name: MemoryAllocationPlayback
data.value: The application is allocating memory for the preview. Please wait...

data.name: MemoryAllocationPlaybackVST
data.value: The application is allocating memory for the preview. Edit the VST DSPs settings when asked. Please wait...

data.name: MIDITracks
data.comment: How many tracks are present in the MIDI.

data.name: PatreonDesc
data.value:
This project can not maintain itself by downloads only.
I will not be able to keep this program updated forever, that's why becoming a patron could help me improve its features, and also help me improve the equipment that I work with.
Becoming one is completely optional, and if you don't want to see this dialog anymore, just click on "Do not show this ever again". You can still become one by navigating to "Help > Become a patron".
Thank you in advance.

data.name: PlaybackStatusSlower
VSTiModeOnLegal
data.value: VSTi mode activated. The legal warning will not be displayed anymore.

data.name: VSTNameAndVersion
data.comment: Shows you the name of the VST, the creator, and its version number.

data.name: CopyText
data.comment: Used when creating a copy of an existing file.

data.name: ParsingMIDIInfoStatus
data.value: Parsed {0} file(s) out of {1}. Please wait...

data.name: CorruptedSetupDesc
data.value:
The updated setup for the converter is corrupted. Can not install update!
Press OK to continue.

data.name: MissingTranslations
data.value: Some languages might not be available yet.

data.name: SBIOMB
data.value: Show balloons/toast notifications instead of message boxes

data.name: MinimizedToTray
data.value: The converter has been minimized to tray. Click the icon on the system tray to restore it.

data.name: InvalidArg
data.value: {0} is not a valid command line argument! Click OK to continue.

data.name: SelectedSF
data.comment: Selected SoundFont, in the BankNPresetSel window.

data.name: PreloadDefaultSF
data.value: Always preload the default SoundFont, if present.

data.name: AFIT
data.value: Show ignore tracks dialog before export

data.name: IgnoreNotes1
data.value: Ignore notes in between two velocity values

data.name: Limit88
data.value: Limit key range to 88 keys (Excluding drums channel)

data.name: TracksToIgnoreTitle
data.value: Which tracks do you want to ignore?

data.name: PreloadSamplesNotSF
data.value: Preload the required samples, rather than the entire SoundFonts.

data.name: PreloadSamplesNotSFWarn
data.value: Preloading the samples will force the converter to scan the entire MIDI, to check which samples need to be preloaded. This behavior might make the converter stall in the check for minutes, even hours, depending on how big both the MIDI and the SoundFonts are. For Black MIDI playback/conversion, it is highly suggested to leave this option unchecked.

data.name: PreloadSFOfMIDI
data.value: Preloads SoundFonts with the same name and path as the MIDI.

data.name: ParsingMIDIInfoInvalidOutcome
data.value: Out of {0} files, {1} were valid and {2} were invalid.

data.name: ParsingMIDIInfoPrepare
data.comment: It's preparing the AddingMIDIs window for the process.
